law.catch_line: On finding a tier 1 plant in violation of § 9.5-302(a)(2) of this subtitle, the Secretary may:...

text.section:
On finding a tier 1 plant in violation of § 9.5-302(a)(2) of this subtitle, the Secretary may:
Issue a written condemnation seizure order;
Mark or tag the plant in a conspicuous manner; and
Provide written notice to the owner, tenant, or person in charge of the premises.

section.section: On notice from the Secretary, a person shall dispose of a tier 1 plant in accordance with regulations adopted by the Secretary.

If a tier 1 plant is not disposed of in accordance with paragraph (1) of this subsection, the Secretary shall:
Destroy the plant;
Prepare a statement of facts and a statement of the expense of destruction; and
Provide copies of the statements to the Attorney General.
The Attorney General shall institute the appropriate proceeding to collect the expenses due to the Secretary.
A copy of the statements prepared under subsection (b)(2) of this section is sufficient evidence to prove a claim under this subsection.
